content: > enjoy 15 % off this pattern for its release by entering code tamo until feb 28 tamo is a loose-fitting circular yoke pullover worked seamlessly from the top down a simple colorwork pattern adorns the yoke and is echoed at the bottom of the body and of the sleeves giving it a sport chic style **sizes** finished bust circumference 91 99 112 120 131 141 150 162 cm 35½ 39 44 47¼ 51¼ 55½ 59 63¾ ′′ schematics with finished measurements to be found in the photos recommended ease 7 to 17 cm 2¾ to 6¾′′ of positive ease at the bust shown in size 99 cm 3′′ with 12 cm 4¾′′ of positive ease at the bust **materials yarn** approx 810 900 990 1080 1170 1260 1350 1440 m 885 985 1080 1180 1280 1375 1475 1575 yd of fingering weight yarn held together with the same yardage of kidsilk lace weight yarn for the main color mc approx 170 210 200 220 240 260 280 300 320 m 185 985 220 240 260 285 305 330 350 yd of fingering weight yarn held together with the same yardage of kidsilk lace weight yarn for each of the contrasting color cc1 and cc2 shown in holstgarn tides 70% pure new wool 30% silk 287 m 314 yd /50 g in the colors 24 mustard cp 20 sand cc1 and 16 nightshade cc2 and et ito sensai 60% mohair 40% silk 240 m 260 yd /20 g in the colors 302-cinnamon cp 330-white cc1 and 341-orient blue cc2 **needles** **body and sleeves ** 4 mm us size 6 60 cm 24″ and 80 cm 32″ minimum for magic loop method circular needles **ribbing ** 3 5 mm us size 2 60 cm 24″ and 80 cm 32″ minimum for magic loop method circular needles adjust needle size if necessary to obtain the correct gauge **notions** stitch markers stitch holders or waste yarn tapestry needle **gauge** 21 sts and 33 rnds = 10 cm 4′′ in st st with larger needle after blocking note should your gauge for the stranded colorwork section be too tight consider going up a needle size for that section to save time take time to check gauge ----------- > > profitez de 15 % de réduction sur le patron pour sa sortie en utilisant le code tamo jusqu au 28 février tamo est un pull construit avec un empiècement circulaire un motif en jacquard simple souligne le buste le bas du corps et des manches dans un esprit sport chic il se tricote du haut vers le bas sans couture avec une aisance de 5 à 15 cm **tailles** tour de buste sur le vêtement fini 91 99 112 120 131 141 150 162 cm le modèle se tricote avec une aisance positive de 7 à 17 cm au niveau du tour de poitrine et des manches ajustées le prototype a été tricoté en taille 99 avec une aisance positive de 12 cm **fournitures laine**
